title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Mordant painted and dyed cotton (chintz)
Medium: cotton 
Technique: mordants for three reds and purple applied by brush or pen; blue applied over resist; yellow over blue to create green; mordant for background spattered through a stencil; plain weave fou
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 38.1 x 10.8 cm (15 x 4 1/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 14 x 13.3 cm (5 1/2 x 5 1/4 in.)
description: Large, exotic flowers and curving stems in reds and blues on a red speckled background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Mordant painted and dyed cotton (chintz)
Medium: cotton 
Technique: mordants for three reds and purple applied by brush or pen; blue applied over resist; yellow over blue to create green; mordant for background spattered through a stencil; plain weave fou. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-68-a,b.
